Name: Rescue Elves
About the game: young hiki-mori guy in his school years, he was apathetic to everything except his classmate, she was the only one who was not indifferent to him, but because of ridicule from classmates he closes himself and almost reaches suicide. 4 years have passed, but since then, his best friend has become reclusiveness, computer games and manga. One evening, a strange letter arrives to the hero, in which he is invited to immerse himself in virtual reality. But the hero does not yet know that the city of elves, magicians and the evil sorceress who enslaved all men will be waiting for him there. A difficult choice will fall on his shoulders, to help the elves or to take the path of evil and become a new villain. You have to plunge into the fantasy world, fight against goblins, evil animals, a real Cerberus, and an evil witch! The game consists of short stories and casual games, more than 10 battles, will not let you get bored.
